mapper.insert: insert into kunpeng.port(longitude, latitude, port_QR_str_in, port_QR_str_out, description) values (#{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{port_QR_str_in}, #{port_QR_str_out}, #{description})
mapper.update: update kunpeng.port set longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, port_QR_str_in = #{port_QR_str_in}, port_QR_str_out = #{port_QR_str_out}, description = #{description} where port_id = #{port_id}
mapper.select: select status from kunpeng.record where wechat_id=#{wechat_id} order by timestamp desc LIMIT 1
